name: E20R Enhanced Members List for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Extensible, sortable & bulk action capable members listing tool for Paid Memberships Pro
sections.changelog:
2.2

  1. BUG FIX: No longer supporting per line 'Cancel Membership' link

2.1

  1. BUG FIX: Clear search field when user clicks 'Update List' button
  2. BUG FIX: Show 'Invalid' if the startdate value is incorrect (not a current/real date value)
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add build tools & one-click update support tools
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Single license text instance
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Load class if not previously defined
  6. ENHANCEMENT: WordPress Style updates
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Improved English grammar in error message

2.0

  1. Initial public release
sections.faq:
I found a bug in the plugin.

Please report your issue to us by using the Enhanced Members List Support Forum on The Eighty / 20 Website, and we'll normally respond within 1 business day.
